name: Cold War Conflicts: Days in the Field 1950-1973
name_original: Cold War Conflicts: Days in the Field 1950-1973
description:
Cold War Conflicts: Days in the Field 1950-1973 is a strategy game developed by Red Ice Software. It came out on 26-03-2004. It was published by GMX Media.
Cold War Conflicts: Days in the Field 1950-1973 is available on PC.
